Title: Bad Luck
Description: The BREW-U malfunctions: roll on the Permanent table.

Title: Immersive
Description: Must do a silly character voice. If you ever forget, take 1d6 damage.

Title: Unloaded
Description: A random equipped gun doesn't spawn with you. You will see it for sale at the next shop you find.

Title: Refractory
Description: Every time you roll a natural 20 on an Attack poll, fall asleep for the next turn.

Title: No Boom
Description: Current grenades is set to 0.

Title: Stumbling
Description: -1 on Talk and Traverse Checks for the day

Title: Pistol Perplexion
Description: your vault Hunter is unable to tell the difference between guns and food.

Title: Health Drain
Description: -5 max Health for the day.

Title: Power Drain
Description: -20 max Shields for the day.

Title: Punch Drunk
Description: You must punch every nonâ€”combatant NPC you meet.

Title: Impatient
Description: -1 on Search and Sneak Checks for the day.

Title: REROLL
Description: REROLL

Title: Catch-A-Phrase
Description: Your Vault Hunter is now desperate to popularize a stupid catch phrase they've just come up with.

Title: Four Hundred and Four
Description: One of your non-current guns doesn't respawn.

Title: Your Hands Are Guns
Description: Your currently equipped gun Fuses into the bones of your hands. You no longer have fingers, or the ability to grab things.

Title: REROLL
Description: REROLL

Title: Brain Freeze
Description: -1 on Insight and Interact Checks for the day.

Title: The Best Policy
Description: Your vault Hunter is now incapable of lying For the test of the day.

Title: Minor Issue
Description: Your vault Hunter is now Four years old. All their stats are the same, but they look and speak like a four year old.

Title: You Are Claptrap
Description: A bolt of lightning strikes you and you into a claptrap unit. All of your stats ave reduced by 2 and you have to Speak in an annoying voice until the end of the day.

Title: Bad Reputation
Description: Word of how you fell in battle gets around. There's a 25% chance that any NPC you meet will have heard the embarrassing story of how you got beaten up, and will respect you less for it.

Title: How2English?
Description: You forget 10% of your vocabulary -1 on Talk Checks.

Title: I had a Bad experience
Description: You become terrified of the particular Enemy type who defeated you. In all future combats with this particular Enemy type, take -1 to all Accuracy Rolls

Title: Trinket
Description: Loss of sentimental item. Probably something important to the campaign.

Title: Least Favorite
Description: The other play must determine your least favorite food/ music/fitm/book/whatever. That is now your Vault Hunter's FAVORITE thing in the world, and they will bring it up any time they can elegantly do so.

Title: Scar Tissue
Description: Generates a horrific scar in the location where you took Damage. 25% chance to be recognized when entering a town.

Title: Touchy Feely
Description: You have the insatiable urge to touch everything you see, including things you probably shouldn't. -1 on Interact Checks.

Title: Cool Eyepatch
Description: Your character loses an eye and has to wear a badass eyepatch over the socket. You get a -2 to search checks, but a +3 to Interact Checks

Title: Love and Loss
Description: Your character is nursed back to health by an adorable, animal of the BM's choosing. The BM must then work the cute animal into the story, and then somehow tragically remove them within the next two sessions.

Title: Synapse Oops
Description: Brain farts are now a medical condition you have. -1 on Insight Checks.

Title: Your Dad is Disappointed in You
Description: Your dad hears about how you died. He is disappointed in you. Your mom is still proud of you though.

Title: Willful Ignorance
Description: Your Vault Hunter refuses to believe they fell in battle and assumes everyone is misremembering the event.

Title: Riverdance
Description: Metal clogs get stuck on your feet. -1 on Sneak Checks.

Title: Family Vengeance
Description: Add "JR" to your character's name. You now your own Child, avenging the death of your parent.

Title: Crybaby
Description: Death hurt a lot, and your Vault Hunter cries when they think about it.

Title: No Ships, Sherlock
Description: Your trusty sleuthing cap got rakk poop on it. -1 on Search Checks.

Title: Fart Fartington
Description: Your vault Hunter's name is now Fart Fartington. This can never be changed. If the Vault Hunter's name is already Fart Fartington, "Fart Fartington" becomes their new nickname. Their name would now be Fart "Fart Fartington" Fartington.
Your depth perception got pretty deep. -1 on Traverse Checks.

Title: Unsteady Hands
Description: Whenever you swap guns, roll a D20. On a 1, the gun flies out of your hands and lands 2 squares away.

Title: Godkiller
Description: Your Vault Hunter blames the one TRULY responsible for their death: You. Your Vault Hunter now has a personal vendetta against you. The BM will insert you into the story somewhere and your Vault Hunter will do whatever is necessary to hunt you down and say some very harsh words.
